title: President Trump Scores a Trade Deal with Canada and Defends Brett Kavanaugh | Carol Anderson
itunes:title: President Trump Scores a Trade Deal with Canada and Defends Brett Kavanaugh | Carol Anderson
description:
First Lady Melania Trump announces her plans to head to Africa, President Trump makes a deal with Canada and Mexico, and author Carol Anderson discusses "One Person, No Vote."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
